combinedCapabilities.name: Three-Hat Technical Leadership Framework
combinedCapabilities.description: Integrating systems architecture, product management, and hands-on implementation for comprehensive AI solutions
applications: Systems Architect Hat: Designing scalable AI infrastructure with 80/20 optimization
Product Manager Hat: Data-driven feature prioritization and user journey optimization
Implementation Hat: Quality gates, CI/CD pipelines, and developer experience optimization
Preventing technical debt through architectural foresight (69→10 tools optimization)
Chaos engineering readiness for 10x growth scenarios
Technical health audits and operational excellence design

roadmap.description: Implement a system of autonomous agents that can perform market research and compile findings
Create a workshop framework to help businesses identify and implement AI opportunities
Develop a reusable framework for building industry-specific autonomous agents

casestudies.title: Autonomous Research Team for Market Analysis
casestudies.description: Built a CrewAI-based system of agents that collaboratively performed market research and trend analysis
outcomes: Delivered comprehensive market reports in 1/3 of the time
Increased depth of analysis through systematic research patterns
Reduced costs of market intelligence gathering

threeHatFramework.systemsArchitect: Designed modular agent architecture that scaled from 3 to 12 agents without complexity explosion
threeHatFramework.productManager: Optimized user journey from 30min to 2min for first insights
threeHatFramework.implementation: Built comprehensive testing suite and monitoring dashboard for agent performance

casestudies.title: Marketing & Operations Automation - Ray of Joy Therapy
casestudies.description: Implementing comprehensive automation solutions for therapy practice management, marketing operations, and client engagement at rayofjoytherapy.com
outcomes: Streamlined client onboarding and scheduling processes
Automated marketing content distribution and engagement
Enhanced operational efficiency through integrated systems

threeHatFramework.systemsArchitect: Designed integrated automation architecture preventing tool sprawl (learned from 69→10 tools experience)
threeHatFramework.productManager: Prioritized therapist time-saving features based on usage data and feedback loops
threeHatFramework.implementation: Established monitoring and quality gates for all automated client communications

casestudies.title: B2B Corporate Gift Platform Transformation
casestudies.description: Website rebuild and business intelligence implementation for leading Singapore corporate gift company
outcomes: Enhanced digital presence and user experience
Integrated business intelligence for data-driven decisions
